name: VOLUMETRIC OSCILLOSCOPE VR
description:
Interact with my Volumetric Oscilloscope in a virtual reality environment. This new edition of Volumetric Oscilloscope includes the ability to use your computer's audio output for it's display. No more loading files into the program manually, just play audio with any software you choose and you're ready to use the scope.


CONTROLS:

grip buttons to move the scope

trigger to recenter and resize

trackpad button to freeze the oscilloscope

app menu to toggle case and flatscope
